name: Virtual Police Officer Family
description:
Grab a chance to become a virtual police officer in the crime city games, enjoy action packed game with police car chase, catching gangsters and robber who make trouble in your city boundaries. Experience life of an honest police officer, and practice his day to day tasks. Wake up in the morning get dressed go to the police station. Chase the bad guys. Solve the mysterious cases in the neighborhood. By solving the clues and hint the robber left behind in the Mr. Frances house, identify the real thug and arrest him, put him behind the bars. Download now to enjoy police simulation game now!

Features of virtual police officer:
Fun and challenging levels and missions
Beautiful models of police officers
Clues and finding criminal’s levels
3D crime city environment
